name: Minimize!
statement: You are given two integers $$$a$$$ and $$$b$$$ ($$$a \leq b$$$). Over all possible integer values of $$$c$$$ ($$$a \leq c \leq b$$$), find the minimum value of $$$(c - a) + (b - c)$$$.
inputFormat: The first line contains $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \leq t \leq 55$$$) â€” the number of test cases. Each test case contains two integers $$$a$$$ and $$$b$$$ ($$$1 \leq a \leq b \leq 10$$$).
outputFormat: For each test case, output the minimum possible value of $$$(c - a) + (b - c)$$$ on a new line.
